question: How is Indocyanine green (ICG) used?
ideal_answer: Indocyanine green (ICG) is used for hepatic function evaluation before surgical procedure and fundus evaluation. It is also used in several nanoparticle-sized formulations for thermal ablation and photodynamic therapy.
